titleStmt.title: The taking of VVinchester by the Parliaments forces. As also the surrendring up of the castle. Wherein they tooke two regiments of the cavalleres that were under the command of the Lord Grandison. / By I. VV. an eye witnesse.
titleStmt.author: Ward, John, fl. 1642-1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
